sentences.sContent: He tried to corrupt the policeman with money.
sentences.sContent_eng: He tried to corrupt the policeman with money.
sentences.sCn: 他设法用金钱向警察行贿。

sentences.sContent: The thief withered under the stare of the policeman.
sentences.sContent_eng: The thief withered under the stare of the policeman.
sentences.sCn: 小偷在警察的逼视下显得惶恐不安。

sentences.sContent: I think he must be a policeman, he keeps fishing for information.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think he must be a policeman, he keeps fishing for information.
sentences.sCn: 我想他肯定是警察，他不断地转弯抹角地打听消息。

synos.tran: 警察，警员；[分化]淀帚（橡皮头玻璃搅棒）

trans.tranOther: A policeman is a man who is a member of the police force
